description: IRFPAI_ABSTRACTIONS stores information for RDI records with a type of IRF-PAI.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: IRFPAI_CMG_CODE
columns.description: Stores CMG code associated with IRF-PAI RDI record.

columns.name: IRFPAI_CMG_DATE
columns.description: Stores the CMG date. CMG date is the date IRF-PAI is accepted by CMS.

columns.name: PRES_COMPLIANCE_ADM_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the patient qualifies as presumptive compliant or not based on the admission date.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ADJ_COMPLIANCE_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the patient qualifies as adjusted compliant or not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRES_COMPLIANCE_ADM_YN

columns.name: PRES_COMPLIANCE_DIS_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the patient qualifies as presumptive compliant or not based on the discharge date.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRES_COMPLIANCE_ADM_YN

columns.name: MEDICARE_PAT_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the IRF-PAI is for a Medicare patient. This is determined by what is entered in the Payer Information section of the IRF-PAI.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRES_COMPLIANCE_ADM_YN

columns.name: PAT_ADMISSION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date that the patient was admitted to the IRF. This is determined by what is entered in the Identification Information section of the IRF-PAI.

columns.name: REHAB_IMPAIRMENT_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the Rehab Impairment Category (RIC) for this IRF-PAI abstraction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Stroke


Traumatic Brain Injury


Nontraumatic Brain Injury


Traumatic Spinal Cord Injury


Nontraumatic Spinal Cord Injury


Neurological


Fracture of Lower Extremity


Replacement of Lower Extremity Joint


Other Orthopedic


Amputation, Lower Extremity


Amputation, Other


Osteoarthritis


Rheumatoid, Other Arthritis


Cardiac


Pulmonary


Pain Syndrome


Major Multiple Trauma, No Brain Injury or Spinal Cord Injury


Major Multiple Trauma, with Brain or Spinal Cord Injury


Guillain Barre


Miscellaneous


Burns
